## Classes

| Class | Description |
| --- | --- |
| class [NotesStorageFacility](./notesstoragefacility) | The Notes Storage Facility (NSF) database file is used by (IBM) Lotus Notes and Domino to store different kind of objects like e-mail, appointments and documents, but also application forms and views. |
